SECTION.SUBTEXT: Wine-Searcher's Privacy Policy Your security and privacy are important to us.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Payment Security
SECTION.SUBTEXT: With Wine-Searcher's 'Pro Version' subscriptions, your credit card details are completely secure. During the authorization process your number is held in an encrypted form at all times, and it is removed from our server immediately after the process is complete. We do not store credit card numbers after payment.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Personal Details
SECTION.SUBTEXT: We take our site users' privacy very seriously and never pass details to third parties. All information is held in a secure form on our server.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Emails
SECTION.SUBTEXT: Email addresses collected for notifying wine availability are used solely for that purpose. We will not sell or share our site users' email addresses. We never spam.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Search History
SECTION.SUBTEXT: All searches on the site are recorded and we summarize that information for generating statistics (such as our pages showing the top searches last month). Within the Pro Version you can access your own recent history of contacts with wine merchants.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Price Lists and other Merchant Data
SECTION.SUBTEXT: We use price data and merchant details for various additional services; including (but not limited to), calculating average prices, valuation services, "where to buy" links on third party websites via our wine widgets, and as data supplied to third party applications (typically mobile phone apps).

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Cookies
SECTION.SUBTEXT: We use cookies to improve usability (e.g. to remember which currency you prefer to use). If you use the Pro Version, cookies make that part of the site much easier to use.
